price: 45. Seuls te demandent cette dispense ceux qui ne croient pas en Allah et au Jour Dernier, ceux dont les cœurs sont rongés par le doute. Eux, dans leur incertitude, pataugent hésitants.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَٱرۡتَابَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِي رَيۡبِهِمۡ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innamā yastadhinuka alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-ir'tābat qulūbuhum fahum fī raybihim yataraddadūna
